summary: The document is a forensic analysis report from ABC Forensic Services Laboratory regarding a Glock 17 pistol and associated items. The pistol was test fired, and a cartridge case was entered into NIBIN, resulting in a possible investigative lead linking two cases. The lead is not confirmed and requires further microscopic comparison for verification.
conclusion: A NIBIN investigative lead was developed linking this case with another, but confirmation requires further analysis.

description: Black in color Glock 17 pistol, 9x19mm caliber (S/N: obliterated)
Unloaded black in color Glock 9mm magazine
The pistol functions properly and was test fired for NIBIN entry.
Laboratory test cartridge case fired by Item BCSO-3
Entered into NIBIN, leading to a possible investigative lead.
Seven stray bronze and silver in color 9mm unfired cartridges with Luger headstamp
